channel.title: Json-Ld on Boettiger Group
channel.description: Recent content in Json-Ld on Boettiger Group

item.title: JSON-LD Vita exploration
item.description: Using JSON Queries (JQ) Pure JSON vita <- readr::read_file("../../static/js/vita.json") jq(vita, '."@reverse".author[] | { year: .dateCreated, author: .author[] | [.givenName, .familyName] | join(" ") }') %>% combine() %>% fromJSON() year author 2017-12-09 Wayne M. Getz 2017-12-09 Charles R. Marshall 2017-12-09 Colin J. Carlson 2017-12-09 Luca Giuggioli 2017-12-09 Sadie J. Ryan 2017-12-09 Stephanie S. Romañach 2017-12-09 Carl Boettiger 2017-12-09 Samuel D. Chamberlain 2017-12-09 Laurel Larsen 2017-12-09 Paolo D’Odorico 2017-12-09 David O’Sullivan 2017-03-15 Stephanie E.
